title: pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body: when I press the league icon on my taskbar, it opens up with "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working". help?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client isn't launching due to a particular problem with security. League interacts with a lot of files outside of the League installation folder, therefore it needs permission in order to do so. To ensure your settings are correct in this regard, follow our [permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if this helped.
